sense.name: The act of intercourse.
sense.examples: They had sex in the back seat. The film contained no sex or violence. Great sex is the product of great communication.

sense.name: Either of the two categories (male or female) into which most organisms are divided, or key properties that distinguish the categories.
sense.examples: She didn't want to know the sex of the fetus. There is a war between the sexes. She showed him her sex.
